sections.title: Anchor-Only References Test
sections.body:
Test the canonical anchor-only syntax using `[ ]`:

Footnote anchor-only: [ ](node:fn1?display=footnote)

Sidenote anchor-only: [ ](node:sn1?display=sidenote)

Margin note anchor-only: [ ](node:mn1?display=margin)

Overlay anchor-only: [ ](node:overlay1?display=overlay)

Inline anchor-only: [ ](node:inline1?display=inline)

Stretch anchor-only: [ ](node:stretch1?display=stretch)

Page anchor-only: [ ](node:page1?display=page)

Mixed with text-linked: [explicit text](node:mixed?display=inline) and anchor-only [ ](node:mixed?display=inline).
